title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5014.13 - Ticket ownership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5014.13 - Ticket ownership

State Regulations
A courier service that purchases a lottery ticket on
instruction from a courier customer holds such ticket in trust for such courier
customer and acquires no ownership interest in such ticket. Notwithstanding
such lack of ownership, a courier service may destroy a draw game lottery
ticket so long as such courier service complies with the retention requirements
set forth in subdivision (f) of section
5014.12
of this
chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

5014.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
